models.name: Zombie
models.description: A reanimated corpse. Beware its diseased bite, or you may find that you start to crave flesh

models.name: Mimic
models.description: A failed experiment of a mad wizard. This creature hides in plain sight, and prays on greedy adventurers

models.name: Dragon
models.description: A great Red Dragon. Few who encounter this mighty foe escape with their lives.

models.name: Mindflayer
models.description: A creature of the deep Underdark. Powerful psionic warriors, they enthrall weaker creatures to do their bidding.
